Html:
Hi

I'm trying to play a tone and change its frequency in realtime. For generating the tone I used the Sine Wave Tutorial but changing the frequency while the tone is playing leads to a clipping. Can someone explain this?

Is there a possibility to playback a wav or midi file and changing the pitch in realtime?

Thanks in advance,

Alex
it is possible, but you'd have to write the code to do it yourself. NAudio doesn't have a built-in pitch shifting algorithm.
